About Me

My name is Wonhyuk Jang. I’m an AI Scientist at LG Electronics, in South Korea. My interest is in Large Language Model (LLM), Multimodal Model and various AI, data science oriented projects. I am actively seeking for a full-time position in AI/Data Science.

Experience

LG Electronics

AI Scientist

August 2021 - Present

https://www.lg.com/global/

  • Deployed a Multi-Modal Device-Directed Detection module designed for back-to-back requests, with a commercial launch planned for early 2025
  • Developed Multi-modal Error Correction module that injects speech features into sLLM, and perform instruction tuning on N-best hypothesis to improve ASR performance
  • Built sLLM based Neural Rescoring ASR engines that understands voice commands, resulting in a 2.85% improvement in Sentence Accuracy on real user data.
  • Developed Spoken Language Understanding models that achieve superior performance in both intent classification and NER while also reducing User Perceived Latency
  • Implemented a Knowledge Injected Domain classifier that enables effective adaptation to constantly evolving TV content and improved baseline model by 24%
